metadata.name: FIRE IN THE EYES
metadata.description: Suman, a gypsy little girl from Kalbeliya tribe in Pushkar. She was an amazing dancer and she has complete iris heterochromia with a hazel colour eye. Her life has been full of misery since childhood, she grew up in the midst of suffering, her beautiful eyes attracted someones. She has become a favorite of any photographer going to see the Pushkar Fair in Rajasthan, a lot of pictures of her were taken, a small income provided by the photographers who photographed her carried her life forward. She began to regain her lost life, In the meantime, she accidentally gets a marriage proposal, She got married before she reached the age of majority at the insistence of her family. With this marriage her troubles began again, her husband was a heavy drinker and began to harass her constantly. He finally cut off her right hand while she was pregnant, She finally gave birth to a baby boy. The cruel husband abandoned her, but she still lives for her baby.....
